ygData.subject: Re: Diablo vs Windlord
ygData.msgSnippet: Diablo dodged one, and deflected another with his faster-than-sound tail, singing his tail slightly. He growled in mind speak ::Diablo, Transform!:: His Bot

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: steph_teltoli@...

Diablo dodged one, and deflected another with his faster-than-sound 
tail, singing his tail slightly. He growled in mind speak ::Diablo, 
Transform!::

His Bot mode Dark Blue and Midnight Black. He legs are strong, and 
sturdy, supporting a spike at the knee which can be driven into 
opponents. His chest is plain, rippled with muscles, leading to his 
arms which at the elbows have another two spikes. His face remains 
the same, except for the fact the fur gives way to dark blue metal 
and the stalk eyes vanish.

Diablo took out his scythe with his left hand and a huge machine gun 
in his right. The machine gun had poison loaded darts that would 
explode on contact. He fired off 25 poison bullets at WindLord.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> ::Windlord::
> 
> "I figured that..." replied the hawk and he took off in robot mode 
> and pointed his feathers-missiles towards Devil and shot.
